name: Lakeshore Alternative Elementary School
description: Lakeshore represents the diversity of San Francisco. Located directly across the street from Lake Merced. Lowell High School and San Francisco State University are our neighboring schools, with whom they work closely to expand opportunities to ensure all students are academically, socially and emotionally prepared for middle school and beyond. A full time School Social Worker, Literacy Specialist and Elementary Adviser to meet educational, social, and behavioral needs of the students. Serves gra
